5556.name: Star Ornament
5556.description: An essential ingredient needed to make a Christmas Tree. Take it to a Santa trainee, and he will create a Christmas Tree for you.

5557.name: Bead Ornament
5557.description: An ingredient of a Christmas Tree. Take it to a Santa trainee, along with the other necessary ingredients, and he will create a Christmas Tree for you.

5558.name: Fir Tree Branch
5558.description: An ingredient of a Christmas Tree. Take it to a Santa trainee, along with the other necessary ingredients, and he will create a Christmas Tree for you.

5559.name: Flower Pot
5559.description: An ingredient of a Christmas Tree. Take it to a Santa trainee, along with the other necessary ingredients, and he will create a Christmas Tree for you.

5560.name: Christmas Tree
5560.description: Summons a Christmas Tree. Summon Regular Tree

5561.name: Special Christmas Tree
5561.description: Summons a Christmas tree that will increase HP and MP regeneration. This effect is only produced if the Special Christmas Tree is summoned outside of a village. Summon Special Tree

5562.name: Echo Crystal - 1st Carol
5562.description: An echo crystal that plays the 1st carol. It disappears after one use. Item - Carol Sound Crystal

5563.name: Echo Crystal - 2nd Carol
5563.description: An echo crystal that plays the 2nd carol. It disappears after one use. Item - Carol Sound Crystal

5566.name: Echo Crystal - 5th Carol
5566.description: An echo crystal that plays the 5th carol. It disappears after one use. Item - Carol Sound Crystal

5567.name: Letter of Greetings
5567.description: Sla's letter to her disciples. Deliver it to Nyakuri in Dwarven Village.

5568.name: Letter of Greetings
5568.description: Sla's letter to her disciples. Deliver it to Ramus on Talking Island.

5569.name: Water Rune
5569.description: A fragment of seal stone collected by the Lords of Dawn.

5570.name: Water Mantra
5570.description: A fragment of seal stone collected by the Revolutionaries of Dusk.

5571.name: Wind Rune
5571.description: A fragment of seal stone collected by the Lords of Dawn.

5572.description: A fragment of seal stone collected by the Revolutionaries of Dusk.

5574.name: Fire Mantra
5574.description: A fragment of seal stone collected by the Revolutionaries of Dusk.

5575.name: Ancient Adena
5575.description: Money that is circulated only within the Lords of Dawn and Revolutionaries of Dusk. It is also used when trading with the Blacksmith of Mammon.

5577.name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 11
5577.description: A red crystal that absorbs souls, stage 11. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. Consumes 26 MP. Once a soul stone reaches this stage, it can absorb souls independently. No targeting is necessary. Soul Crystal

5578.name: Green Soul Crystal - Stage 11
5578.description: A green crystal that absorbs souls, stage 11. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. Consumes 26 MP. Once a soul stone reaches this stage, it can absorb souls independently. No targeting is necessary. Soul Crystal

5579.name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 11
5579.description: A blue crystal that absorbs souls, stage 11. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. Consumes 26 MP. Once a soul stone reaches this stage, it can absorb souls independently. No targeting is necessary. Soul Crystal

5580.name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 12
5580.description: A red crystal that absorbs souls, stage 12. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. Consumes 26 MP. Once a soul stone reaches this stage, it can absorb souls independently. No targeting is necessary. Soul Crystal

5581.description: A green crystal that absorbs souls, stage 12. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. Consumes 26 MP. Once a soul stone reaches this stage, it can absorb souls independently. No targeting is necessary. Soul Crystal

5582.name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 12
5582.description: A blue crystal that absorbs souls, stage 12. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. Consumes 26 MP. Once a soul stone reaches this stage, it can absorb souls independently. No targeting is necessary. Soul Crystal

5584.description: An echo crystal that plays the 7th carol. It disappears after one use. Item - Carol Sound Crystal

5588.name: Tutorial Guide
5588.description: A booklet containing general information for the new player.

5589.name: Energy Stone
5589.description: Recharges the energy of a Gladiator or a Tyrant 1 stage at a time. Can be recharged up to 2 stages. Energy Stone

5590.name: Squeaking Shoes
5590.description: Makes a unique sound when walking in them.

5591.name: CP Potion
5591.description: Restores CP by 50. CP Gauge Potion

5592.name: Greater CP Potion
5592.description: Restores CP by 200. CP Gauge Potion

5593.name: SP Scroll (Low-Grade)
5593.description: Recharges SP by 500. Scroll of SP

5594.name: SP Scroll (Medium-Grade)
5594.description: Recharges SP by 5000. Scroll of SP

5595.name: SP Scroll (High Grade)
5595.description: Recharges SP by 100000. Scroll of SP

5596.name: Dasparion's Staff - Mana Up
5596.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Mana Up

5597.name: Dasparion's Staff - Conversion
5597.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Conversion

5598.name: Dasparion's Staff - Acumen
5598.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Acumen

5599.name: Meteor Shower - Focus
5599.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 61. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus
